responses.rationale: The segment reports the location of cases but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports confirmation of the virus on a farm but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment explains the mechanism of disease spread but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports new cases and culling numbers but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports national culling numbers but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports Iowa's culling numbers but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports Iowa's status as an egg producer and inventory but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
The segment reports Iowa's annual turkey production but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
